alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 4:59AM AKDT until April 06 at 11:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...The Southeast Gulf Coast and portions of the southern Inner Channels including Hydaburg, Craig, Metlakatla, Ketchikan, Kasaan, and Thorne Bay. * WHEN...From 1 PM to 11 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for aviation and high profile vehicles. Marine and aviation transportation will also likely be impacted.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels
